subject: Skiing
lead_paragraph: Dustin Cook of Canada crashed the party at the United States championships in Winter Park, Colo., and won the super-G, ending the reign of Tommy Ford by 0.04 seconds.
snippet: Dustin Cook of Canada crashed the party at the United States championships in Winter Park, Colo., and won the super-G, ending the reign of Tommy Ford by 0.04 seconds.
